enWisdom: The bane of leadership is arrogance
Dread has been paired with failure

Wisdom: التَّكَبُّرُ فِي الْوِلَايَةِ ذُلٌّ فِي الْعَزْلِ
enWisdom: Haughtiness in sovereignty leads to disgrace in deposition
One who becomes haughty in his kingship has belittled it

Wisdom: مَنْ تَكَبَّرَ فِي وِلَايَتِهِ كَثُرَ عِنْدَ عَزْلِهِ [غَزْلِهِ‏] ذِلَّتُهُ
enWisdom: One who is haughty in his rule, his disgrace is greater when he is deposed

Wisdom: مَنِ اخْتَالَ فِي وِلَايَتِهِ أَبَانَ عَنْ حَمَاقَتِهِ
enWisdom: One who becomes vain in his rule exhibits his stupidity
